headline: Synchrony Accelerates Growth by Expanding CareCredit® Financing to Health and Wellness Providers via Exclusive Clover App Market Integration
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financial services company, today announced an expansion of its integration with Clover, the all-in-one commerce solution from Fiserv (NASDAQ: FISV). The partnership will now empower over 40,000 health and wellness providers using Clover devices to accept CareCredit credit card payments and also facilitate new CareCredit applications at the point of sale.

headline: Why analysts think Trump’s 10% credit card fee cap is a low-probability risk
summary: Investing.com -- President Trump’s proposal to cap credit card interest rates at 10% has drawn attention, but analysts say the risk of meaningful disruption to financial stocks is low.

headline: Checkout.com grabs special banking charter
summary: The payments processor received conditional approval for Georgia’s merchant acquirer limited purpose bank charter.

headline: Fiserv: Beyond The Mirage, A Valuation Under More Realistic Assumptions
summary: Fiserv is executing a turnaround after a period of value destruction, with shares now fairly valued. See why I rate FI stock a Hold right now.
